explains: v. （鬼魂）出没；萦绕在……心头；（长期）困扰；常去（某地）
n. 常去的地方；栖息地

sentences.en: That decision came back to haunt him.
sentences.cn: 那个决定对他造成无法摆脱的困扰。

sentences.en: People say ghosts haunt that old house.
sentences.cn: 据说那座老宅子有鬼魂出没。

sentences.en: The pub is a favourite haunt of artists.
sentences.cn: 这家酒吧是艺术家最爱光顾的地方。
